dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2961742A] COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT; DMCA NOTICE www.bikinibikini.com (
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"), as it does not identify (a) the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed and (b) the material that is claimed to be infringing, and information reasonably sufficient to permit the The Planet to locate the said material.
